name: 淑女同萌！HELLO LADY!
description:
Welcome to TENGA NOBLE SCHOOL!
The school believes in nothing but capability and is built for those talented elites.

There are five beautiful young ladies are the top geniuses among them.
A queen who is noble and self-disciplined.
A lady who is gentle and good-hearted.
A tomboy who lives in a casual manner.
A counselor who is always calm and wise.
A blue-blood who is elegant and generous.
They are called the “Crowns”.

Well, here comes a sixth “Crown”, SHINRI NARITA.
He was selected into the school, with ambitions and mysterious background, then became the top of them all. But he swore to revolutionize everything.
What is his intention?
What has happened and will happen to him?
Why don’t you find out the real story yourself?

HELLO LADY! is a Visual Novel game that tells a glory school story about youth, love, and revenge.
The game is made by famous Japanese developer AKATSUKI WORKS. Welcome to cooperate, fight and fall in love with the young ladies!
